titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to triple the amount of the credit allowed for basic research.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to triple the amount of the credit allowed for basic research.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from 20 to 60 percent the credit amount for basic research expenditures under the tax credit for increasing research activities.
